name: Ragnarok Rebirth
desc: Hela gains a passive ability that allows her, after she secures the final hit on an enemy, to instantly resurrect one of her brothers if they're dead, or give them bonus health if they're living.

name: Metallic Chaos
desc: Scarlet Witch grants Magneto an ability called Metallic Fusion, which he can activate to enchant his greatsword to fire slashing projectiles at enemies.

name: Voltaic Union
desc: Thor grants Captain America and Storm an active ability, which allows them to channel lightning through their normal attacks.

name: Planet X Pals
desc: Rocket Raccoon and Jeff the Land Shark can interact with Groot to ride around on his shoulders, granting them bonus damage reduction.

name: Symbiote Bond
desc: Venom grants Spider-Man and Peni Parker an active ability, which allows them to channel a symbiote through them, dealing damage to enemies and pushing them back.

name: Gamma Charge
desc: Hulk's presence augments Iron Man's Armor Overdrive and Doctor Strange's Maelstrom of Madness, making them more powerful.

name: Ammo Overload
desc: Rocket Raccoon gains a bonus ability that allows him to place an ammo device on the ground. This device grants The Punisher and Winter Soldier faster firing weapons and unlimited ammo while they're nearby.

name: Dimensional Shortcut
desc: Magik grants an active ability to Black Panther and Psylocke, which allows them to travel backward in time while also giving them bonus health.

name: Lunar Force
desc: Cloak & Dagger grant Moon Knight a new active ability, which he can use to become temporarily invisible.

name: Guardian Revival
desc: Adam Warlock shares his cocoon revival ability with Mantis and Star-Lord, allowing them to revive mid-combat every two minutes.

name: Chilling Charisma
desc: Luna Snow grants an active ability to both Namor and Jeff the Land Shark. This ability infuses Jeff's attacks with a slowing field, while augmenting Namor's summons with bonus ice damage.

name: Allied Agents
desc: Hawkeye grants Black Widow a new active ability, which allows her to spot and damage enemy afterimages.

name: Atlas Bond
desc: Iron Fist grants Luna Snow a bonus active ability, which causes an ice ring to explode around her when activated. This ring launches enemies up and heals nearby allies.

name: ESU Alumnus
desc: Spider-Man gives Squirrel Girl a bonus active ability, which allows her to web up enemies via a special web bomb.

name: Storming Ignition
desc: Storm and Human Torch can combine their ultimates together to create a massive, flaming tornado.

name: Fastball Special
desc: Hulk or The Thing can agree to team-up with Wolverine with a button press, allowing either of them to throw Wolverine a great distance.

name: Fantastic Four
desc: Invisible Woman grants Mister Fantastic, Human Torch, and The Thing a new ability, which gives them increased damage resistance and continually generating bonus health.
